name: Syfovre
indications: SYFOVRE is indicated for the treatment of geographic atrophy (GA) secondary to age-related macular degeneration (AMD).
contraindications: The recommended dose for SYFOVRE is 15 mg (0.1 mL of 150 mg/mL solution) administered by intravitreal injection to each affected eye once every 25 to 60 days. ( 2.2 )
adverseReactions: Ocular or Periocular Infections ( 4.1 ) Active Intraocular Inflammation ( 4.2 ) Hypersensitivity ( 4.3 )
